SEARCH
Package UI

Class InventoryUI

java.lang.Object
UI.BaseUI
UI.InventoryUI
public class InventoryUI extends BaseUI
The `InventoryUI` class extends the `BaseUI` class and represents the user interface for managing ingredients in the restaurant management system.
